statements: SELECT * FROM deployment_log WHERE personnel_id = 123;
SELECT incident_id, deployment_time FROM deployment_log ORDER BY deployment_time DESC;
SELECT location FROM deployment_log WHERE deployment_id = 10;
SELECT deployment_id, incident_id, personnel_id FROM deployment_log ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_deployments FROM deployment_log;
SELECT * FROM deployment_log WHERE personnel_id = 1;
SELECT deployment_id, incident_id, personnel_id, deployment_time FROM deployment_log WHERE incident_id = 100 ORDER BY deployment_time DESC;
SELECT personnel_id, COUNT(*) FROM deployment_log GROUP BY personnel_id;
SELECT * FROM deployment_log WHERE location LIKE '%NY%' ORDER BY deployment_time ASC;
SELECT MAX(deployment_time) AS latest_deployment FROM deployment_log;
SELECT * FROM personnel_deployments
SELECT personnel_id, incident_id FROM personnel_deployments WHERE deployment_id = 1
SELECT incident_name, incident_location FROM emergency_incidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM personnel_deployments ORDER BY deployment_time DESC
SELECT personnel_id, COUNT(*) AS deployments_count FROM personnel_deployments GROUP BY personnel_id
SELECT * FROM personnel_deployments
SELECT * FROM personnel_deployments WHERE personnel_id = 101
SELECT personnel_id, incident_id, deployment_time FROM personnel_deployments ORDER BY deployment_time DESC
SELECT * FROM emergency_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2025-01-01'
SELECT incident_id, incident_name, incident_location FROM emergency_incidents WHERE incident_location LIKE '%forest%'
SELECT * FROM deployment_logs;
SELECT deployment_time, deployment_id FROM deployment_logs ORDER BY deployment_time DESC;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_rank FROM personnel WHERE personnel_department = 'Fire Department';
SELECT * FROM emergency_incidents WHERE incident_status = 'Active';
SELECT incident_name, incident_location, incident_type FROM emergency_incidents ORDER BY incident_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM deployment_logs ORDER BY deployment_time DESC;
SELECT incident_name, incident_location FROM emergency_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY incident_id;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_rank, personnel_department FROM personnel WHERE personnel_rank = 'Captain';
SELECT * FROM deployment_logs INNER JOIN emergency_incidents ON deployment_logs.incident_id = emergency_incidents.incident_id;

SELECT personnel_name, COUNT(deployment_id) AS total_deployments FROM deployment_logs INNER JOIN personnel ON deployment_logs.personnel_id = personnel.personnel_id GROUP BY personnel_name ORDER BY total_deployments DESC;
SELECT * FROM personnel;
SELECT personnel_id, personnel_name FROM personnel WHERE personnel_id = 1;
SELECT deployment_id, personnel_id, incident_id, deployment_status FROM deployments ORDER BY deployment_id DESC;
SELECT incident_id, location FROM incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM deployment_log WHERE deployment_id = 3 AND log_timestamp > '2022-03-01';
SELECT personnel_id, personnel_name FROM personnel ORDER BY personnel_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE location='New York' AND incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT personnel_id, COUNT(deployment_id) AS total_deployments FROM deployments GROUP BY personnel_id HAVING total_deployments > 2 ORDER BY total_deployments DESC;
SELECT p.personnel_name, d.deployment_status FROM personnel p INNER JOIN deployments d ON p.personnel_id = d.personnel_id WHERE d.deployment_status='Active';

SELECT di.incident_name, dl.log_timestamp, dl.log_description FROM incidents di INNER JOIN deployments d ON di.incident_id = d.incident_id INNER JOIN deployment_log dl ON d.deployment_id = dl.deployment_id ORDER BY dl.log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Personnel;
SELECT personnel_name, deployment_date FROM Personnel;
SELECT incident_id, incident_location FROM EmergencyIncidents;
SELECT * FROM DeploymentLogs WHERE deployment_status = 'Deployed';
SELECT personnel_name, incident_type, deployment_status FROM Personnel JOIN DeploymentLogs ON Personnel.personnel_id = DeploymentLogs.personnel_id;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_id, deployment_date FROM Personnel;
SELECT * FROM EmergencyIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Fire';
SELECT log_id, personnel_id, incident_id, deployment_status FROM DeploymentLogs ORDER BY deployment_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM PersonnelRoles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT P.personnel_name, IR.role_name FROM Personnel P JOIN PersonnelRoles IR ON P.personnel_id = IR.role_id;
